page.title: 29Horizon Leisure Centre
page.content:
Kidz klub staff will look after your children and entertain them with swimming, arts & crafts, visiting the Play Centre, using bouncy castle and team games. The opening times for the kidz klub are between 8:30am and 5:30pm in the school holidays. Lunch is also provided. Your child can bring a packed lunch or you can pay for a hot lunch with a choice of what you want. It comes with a drink of a choice of a fruit shoot and an ice cream with a chocolate bar.

There are a lot of choice’s of birthday party's. choice’s like a boys football party, an inflatable swimming party, a normal swimming party and a soft play bouncy castle party. The inflatable is a jungle of fun.

Horizon Play Centre at Havant Leisure Centre is one of the largest indoor children's play areas in the south.
Lauren J and Mia W
